summary:
At last! One single place where you can store and share your Skyrim character presets!
This is a web application to store and share Skyrim RaceMenu or ECE presets.
Prepared to be able to find desired preset easily.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/9W5tJRy.png[/img][/center][size=3]Ladies and Gentlemen, Girls and Boys, I had some time and was crazy enough to create small web application (portal) to store and share Skyrim character presets (yes, only for presets, at least for now!) :)[/size]



[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/TJzEjug.png[/img][/center][size=3]This website is kind of a warehouse. A warehouse where you can store and share presets for characters created in Skyrim video game. You might ask: "What for?! We have so many other places, like forums, where we can do similar uploads!". The thing is... all of those places do not provide nice and clean functionality to sort things out. And that's why this website was created.[/size]



[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/7JcNL21.png[/img][/center][size=3]A Preset is a collection of information about ingame character, stored in a file or several files. Those files can be later used by other players to make their hero look like yours. You also may need to provide information about other modifications used (if any), to make a Skyrim character look exactly the same. Unfortunately vanilla game does not provide such functionality by default. To be able to save the preset, you need one of two most popular Skyrim modifications:[/size]

[list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] or[/size]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?][size=3]Enhanced Character Edit[/size][/url]
[/list]



[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/iXkXnyt.png[/img][/center][size=3]To access SkyPreset Warehouse application simply visit [/size][url=http://skypreset-warehouse.eu/][size=3]http://skypreset-warehouse.eu/[/size]
[/url][size=3]From there you may browse and search existing presets.[/size]
[size=3]If you would like to share your presets or rate existing presets, please register and log in.[/size]



[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/zECjYXZ.png[/img][/center][size=3]One of the goals is to have a repository of Skyrim character presets, where users can easily review and search for the preset. Another goal is to create sophisticated methods and search functions.[/size]



[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/AticqDd.png[/img][/center][size=3]I kindly ask you to let me know if you find any bugs. You can also send me your comments or ideas. Contact email is provided on the main page. [/size][size=3]If you would like to [color=#a4c2f4]endorse [/color]SkyPreset Warehouse application, please download a [color=#a4c2f4]dummy[/color] file from the files section :)[/size]

[size=3][center][color=#FFDDDD]Please mind that this is still work in progress. Not all "nice to have" features are available.
[/color]
[color=#a4c2f4]Current state allows for all standard operations. It means you can start using this application without any problems!
DO NOT HESITATE TO DO SO :)[/color][/center][/size]



[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/YufuTJP.png[/img][/center][size=3]
[color=#a4c2f4]Version 0.11 (current)[/color]
[list]
[*][size=3]Added rich editor for preset description. Now you can add some formating to your decription.[/size]
[*][size=3]Removed description column from presets list[/size]
[*][size=3]Minor fixes for GUI[/size]
[/list]
[color=#a4c2f4]Version 0.10[/color]
[list]
[*][size=3]Main page has been re-designed (still temporary)[/size]
[*][size=3]Increased attachment upload limit to 1,8MB[/size]
[*][size=3]Added tutorial video on how to create preset record properly[/size]
[*][size=3]Added drop-down list for preset type versions[/size]
[*][size=3]Added possibility to reorder modifications during preset creation or while editing existing preset[/size]
[/list]
[color=#a4c2f4]Version 0.09[/color]
[list]
[*][size=3]Added 'Total Of Downloads' field to preserve information about downloads amount even if owner remove attachment and will upload new one[/size]
[/list]
[color=#a4c2f4]Version 0.08[/color]
[list]
[*][size=3]Redesigned comments section... again :S I hope now is readable[/size]
[*][size=3]Added required Preset Type Ver. field (version or RaceMenu or ECE used to save preset)[/size]
[*][size=3]Minor fixes "here and there"[/size]
[/list]
[color=#a4c2f4]Version 0.07[/color][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Redesigned comments section[/size]
[*][size=3]Minor changes in "Modifications" section[/size]
[*][size=3]Fixed users rating value (rounded to two decimal places) [/size]
[/list]
[size=3][color=#a4c2f4]Version 0.06[/color][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Now you can add comments to all presets,  even your own[/size]
[*][size=3]Comment owner can edit his comment or delete comment[/size]
[*][size=3]Preset owner can delete all comments from his preset [/size]
[/list]
[size=3][color=#a4c2f4]Version 0.05
[/color][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Added loading dialogs while adding new, editing and deleting preset[/size]
[*][size=3]Added column with downloads amount for each preset on preset list[/size]
[*][size=3]Now preset can be added with published status only with attachment[/size]
[*][size=3]Ratings are now displayed to the nearest 0.1 point[/size]
[/list]
[size=3][color=#a4c2f4]Version 0.04
[/color][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Added a new feature: after you add a new preset go to edit page, you will see "thumb" button below each image. If you click this button a window with an image will pop up. From here, you can select square range of currently displayed picture and by this way set a thumbnail which will be visible on main preset list[/size]
[*][size=3]Most of the code behind has been rewrited to make my life easier in the future (change not visible for end user)[/size]
[*][size=3]From now on you go to preset details page by clicking on anywhere on particular preset row[/size]
[*][size=3]Minor layout changes[/size]
[*][size=3]Many bug fixes[/size]
[/list]
[size=3][color=#a4c2f4]Version 0.03
[/color][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Fixed file size check for png images[/size]
[*][size=3]Fixed some server side validations[/size]
[/list]
[size=3][color=#a4c2f4]Version 0.02
[/color][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Added new feature "Preset 1st image browser". You can view 1st image of each preset, jump to desired image number and jumpt to image preset[/size]
[*][size=3]Reworked how images are handled and served via application[/size]
[*][size=3]Minor layout and bug fixes[/size]
[/list]
[size=3][color=#a4c2f4][size=3]Version 0.01
[/size][/color][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]initial version[/size]
[/list]
author: DaXmAn

files.name: Only To Be Able To Endorse v0.11

files.changelogHtml:
- Added rich editor for preset description. Now you can add some formating to your decription.
- Removed description column from presets list
- Minor fixes for GUI
